title: Game Music Ultimate Bundle - Vol. 1
description: Get ready for the ultimate gaming experience with this massive collection of original music tracks for use in video games. Divided into two volumes, this bundle offers over 12 hours of music.
longDescription:
Looking for the perfect soundtrack for your video game project? This massive collection of over 390 original music tracks is designed to enhance the gaming experience for players of all types. Divided into two volumes, this bundle offers a staggering 12 hours of music, with 15 essential genres to choose from, including action, adventure, puzzle, RPG, simulation, strategy, sports, casual, and horror.


Each volume contains a carefully selection of tracks, ranging from inspiring menu music to epic orchestral scores, ambient soundscapes, and everything in between. As a game developer, you know that music plays a crucial role in creating an immersive gaming experience. This comprehensive collection of original music tracks has been designed to help you do just that. Whether you're looking for music to set the mood in a fantasy RPG or to pump up the energy in an action-packed shooter, this collection has got you covered.


WHY THIS COLLECTION?


What sets this collection apart is its incredible variety and versatility. With over 390 tracks to choose from 154 unique tracks, each with multiple versions and variations, you'll never run out of options when it comes to finding the perfect soundtrack for your game. Plus, all tracks are delivered in high-quality 16-bit/44.1kHz WAV format, ensuring the best sound quality for your game. The 162 loop-ready tracks are also a significant advantage, as they can help you create a seamless musical experience for players that can last for hours without any noticeable gaps or breaks. With loopable versions, you can easily integrate them into your game engine and create seamless, immersive gameplay experiences. And because all of these tracks come with an Unlimited Royalty-Free License, you can use them in any project without worrying about licensing fees or restrictions. In addition, all tracks can be used freely synchronized in your video game on platforms such as YouTube avoiding copyright claims. So you can monetize your videos on YOUTUBE in a SAFE WAY✔️.


This collection is perfect for indie game developers, AAA studios, and anyone in between who is looking for high-quality, original music to enhance their video game projects. Whether you're creating a mobile game or a console blockbuster, this collection has something for everyone.


———————————————————————————–——————––––––––––——––––––––––——––––––––––——––––––––


GAME MUSIC ULTIMATE BUNDLE – VOL. 1

👇👇Listen Now👇👇

▶️Game Music Ultimate Bundle – Vol. I


Game Music Ultimate Bundle – Vol. I is a high-quality original music designed for royalty-free use un video games. Featuring 6+ hour collection of 196 original tracks. including inspiring menu music, adventurous orchestral scores, relaxing ambient tunes, medieval folk songs, world music, classical and epic Hollywood-style soundtracks. Suitable for role-playing, simulation, strategy, action and fantasy games. With a total of 77 unique tracks and 67 loop-ready tracks, you'll have a wide range of options to choose from.


This volume is organized into seven distinct categories, each designed to serve a particular purpose in your game:


  • Inspiring Menu Music: Designed to set a positive tone for casual and puzzle games.

▶️Game Menu Music Pack Collection

  • Adventure Music: Primarily orchestral and inspired by D&D, perfect for fantasy role-playing, simulation, and strategy games.

▶️Game Adventure Collection Music Pack

  • Ambient Music: Relaxing and tranquil, featuring electronic and Celtic-inspired tunes, perfect for open-world, fantasy, and sci-fi games.

▶️Game Ambient Collection Music Pack

  • Medieval Folk Music: Provides a historical context for open-world, fantasy, role-playing, and adventure games.
  • World Music: Featuring primarily Celtic and indigenous music, this collection is perfect for giving your game a geographical or temporal context.

▶️Game World Beat Music Pack

  • Classical Music: Primarily post-romantic European orchestral pieces, ideal for giving your game a historical context in strategy and simulation games.

▶️Game Classical Orchestra Music Pack

  • Epic Orchestral Music: Cinematic Hollywood-style soundtracks, perfect for game trailers, opening themes, action, adventure, role-playing, fantasy, and strategy games.

▶️Game Heroic Fantasy Orchestra Collection Music Pack


This collection is perfect for game developers looking to create an immersive and professional gaming experience. Whether you're a solo developer or part of a team, this collection has something for everyone. With a wide range of styles and genres to choose from, you'll be able to find the perfect track for every scene in your game.


So why wait? Start exploring this massive collection of original music tracks today and take your video game projects to the next level!


More info at www.en.danielnunezmartin.com
technicalDetails:
• 196 original high-quality WAV tracks (16-bit / 44,1 kHz)
  • 77 full-track
  • 67 loopable tracks
  • 6+ hour of music
  • 4,5 GB of music
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free license
  • YouTube Safe✔️
